DescriptionData.Title: KRY Aquacolor - GRAY 32B (55 ml)
DescriptionData.Description:
Kryolan Vivid Aquacolor Gray Face Paint is an intense and deeply colored glycerin-based cake makeup that applies easily with a slightly moistened sponge or brush.
Kryolan's Aquacolor face paint is made of high quality ingredients that are of cosmetic grade. Aquacolor paints are blendable and comfortable to wear. The paints are vibrant and opaque so that your design stays distinct. Kryolan Aquacolor is ideal for face and body painting because its smooth consistency allows it to be easily blended and remain flexible. It doesn't crack once dry and dries quickly to a smudge-proof and durable finish.
It is not recommended that Kryolan Vivid Colors be used around the eyes.
Kryolan Vivid Gray Face Paint comes in a 3.5 ounce (55 ml) container.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 3.5 ounces (55 ml) Kryolan Gray Aquacolor Face Paint Container is good for 200-800 applications
Aquacolor face paints are intensely vivid and comfortable to wear
A creamy and blendable consistency makes it easy to apply and crack proof once it has dried
Water based paint that is easy to remove; just use soap and water
